Entries.529952/C: WizardSong/54 36/Wizard 54 36 0 farmer 50 40 1/addQuest 28/skippable/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -4 1/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 600/emote Wizard 40/pause 500/speak Wizard "Ah... @. I've been waiting for you."/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 400/speak Wizard "Have I ever told you I used to be married?"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 800/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 800/speak Wizard "Strange, I know... for a {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} like me. But it's true."/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "My {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}} and I were together for many years, until... until I made a mistake that drove {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}} away."/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/speak Wizard "{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}} anger and envy were so intense that {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}} turned green and began flying around the countryside, cursing everything in {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}} path..."/pause 1000/speak Wizard "When I found out, I sealed this passage to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}} home... fearing that an innocent villager might fall prey to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}} dark magic."/move Wizard -1 0 3/speak Wizard "But now, it must be unsealed... for when we separated, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}} took my magic ink!#$b#I need that magic ink back!$h#$b#I would do this myself, but I... I can't see {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}} again. That's why I need your help."/move Wizard 1 0 0/speak Wizard "In order to unseal this passage, you'll need a dark talisman. Talk to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KrobusName}}, in the sewer... {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KrobusGender}}}} should know where to find one."/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "I'm counting on you... if you can retrieve my magic ink I promise I'll make it worth your while... Now go!"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/warp Wizard -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite wizardWarp2/faceDirection farmer 2 true/showFrame farmer 94/pause 3000/showFrame farmer 0/specificTemporarySprite witchFlyby/pause 4000/end

I was told there's a saloon somewhere around here?"/move Marcello 0 9 1/warp Marcello -100 -100/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Harvey 3/pause 500/speak Harvey "I saw an ad in the paper for these balloon rides and I knew I had to surprise you with one."/pause 800/question fork1 "#This looks fun!
